name: Trash Refresh
description:
This game is

LD34 Jam Entry, made by our team in 2015:

  • Core developer: Alexey Bondarenko
  • Developer: Artem Moiseenko
  • Developer: Alexey Ovsyannikov
  • Artist: Svetlana Balashova
  • Artist: Mara Sun
  • Music / SFX: Dmitry Shatov
This game provides:
  • space travel
  • some music
  • great art
  • 3 levels
  • beautiful ending

-----

Original description from ludumdare.com

After the disaster, only debris flying in space around you...
Yep, you are garbage collector :)

Collect small debris and refill your tank.

Avoid large debris - because it wants to collect you!

When you come back to the family?

Do not forget the laws of physics
And hope for the magic

Good luck!
